mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.NAME exam_name, b.exam_identity, c.id, c.num, c.NAME teacher_name FROM t_exam_plan a, t_exam b, t_teacher c WHERE a.exam_id = b.id AND c.id = a.teacher_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_EXAM_PLAN ( ID, TEACHER_ID, EXAM_ID, CLOSETIME, PUBLISHTIME, `STATUS` ) VALUES (#{id}, #{teacher_id}, #{exam_id}, #{closetime}, #{publishtime}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_EXAM_PLAN T SET T.STATUS=#{status} WHERE T.ID=#{plan_id}
mapper.select: select * from t_choice t where id in ( select t.choice_id from t_exam_middle t where t.exam_id=#{value})
select a.*,b.question_content from t_answer_question a,t_question_content b where a.id in ( select t.question_id from t_exam_question t where t.exam_id=#{value}) and a.id=b.question_id

SELECT c. NAME, a.student_id, a.exam_id, b.question, a.question_answer answer, d.exam_identity, d.name exam_name FROM t_answer a, t_choice b, t_student c, t_exam d WHERE a.student_id = #{student_id} AND a.exam_id = #{exam_id} AND b.id = a.question_id AND c.id = a.student_id and a.exam_id=d.id

SELECT b. NAME, c.exam_identity, c. NAME exam_name, c.id exam_id, b.id student_id FROM t_answer a, t_student b, t_exam c, t_exam_plan d WHERE a.exam_id = c.id AND a.exam_id = #{value} AND b.id = a.student_id GROUP BY b.id

SELECT c.NAME, a.student_id, a.exam_id, b.question_name, a.question_answer answer, d.exam_identity, d.name exam_name, e.question_content FROM t_answer a, t_answer_question b, t_student c, t_exam d, t_question_content e WHERE a.student_id = #{student_id} AND a.exam_id = #{exam_id} AND b.id = a.question_id AND c.id = a.student_id and a.exam_id=d.id AND b.id=e.question_id
SELECT a.*, b.NAME exam_name, b.exam_identity, c.id, c.num, c.NAME teacher_name FROM t_exam_plan a, t_exam b, t_teacher c WHERE a.exam_id = b.id AND c.id = a.teacher_id and status='开放'
SELECT a.id exam_id, c.id choice_id, c.question, c.`SELECT`, c.question_type FROM t_exam a, t_exam_middle b, t_choice c WHERE a.id = b.exam_id AND b.choice_id = c.id AND a.id = #{value}

SELECT a.id exam_id, c.id question_id, d.id content_id, c.question_name, d.question_content FROM t_exam a, t_exam_question b, t_answer_question c, t_question_content d WHERE a.id = b.exam_id AND c.id = b.question_id AND d.question_id = c.id AND a.id = #{value}
